); PublicDetails.propTypes = { verifiedGithub: PropTypes.string, verifiedTwitter: PropTypes.string, email: PropTypes.string, location: PropTypes.string, website: PropTypes.string, job: PropTypes.string, school: PropTypes.string, degree: PropTypes.string, memberSince: PropTypes.string, major: PropTypes.string, year: PropTypes.string, employer: PropTypes.string, birthday: PropTypes.string, description: PropTypes.string, }; PublicDetails.defaultProps = { verifiedGithub: '', verifiedTwitter: '', email: '', description: '', location: '', memberSince: '', website: '', birthday: '', job: '', school: '', degree: '', major: '', year: '', employer: '', }; function mapState(state) { return { verifiedGithub: state.threeBox.publicVerifiedAccounts && state.threeBox.publicVerifiedAccounts.github.username, verifiedTwitter: state.threeBox.publicVerifiedAccounts && state.threeBox.publicVerifiedAccounts.twitter.username, email: state.threeBox.publicProfile && state.threeBox.publicProfile.email, description: state.threeBox.publicProfile && state.threeBox.publicProfile.description, location: state.threeBox.publicProfile && state.threeBox.publicProfile.location, website: state.threeBox.publicProfile && state.threeBox.publicProfile.website, birthday: state.threeBox.publicProfile && state.threeBox.publicProfile.birthday, memberSince: state.threeBox.publicProfile && state.threeBox.publicProfile.memberSince, job: state.threeBox.publicProfile && state.threeBox.jpublicProfile.job, school: state.threeBox.publicProfile && state.threeBox.publicProfile.school, degree: state.threeBox.publicProfile && state.threeBox.publicProfile.degree, major: state.threeBox.publicProfile && state.threeBox.publicProfile.major, year: state.threeBox.publicProfile && state.threeBox.publicProfile.year, employer: state.threeBox.publicProfile && state.threeBox.publicProfile.employer, }; } export default connect(mapState)(PublicDetails);
